public static void Arraycopy (Java.Lang.Object src, int srcPos, Java.Lang.Object dest, int destPos, int length);
.method public static hidebysig void Arraycopy(class Java.Lang.Object src, int32 srcPos, class Java.Lang.Object dest, int32 destPos, int32 length) cil managed

Docs.param: the source array.
starting position in the source array.
the destination array.
starting position in the destination data.
the number of array elements to be copied.
Docs.summary: Copies an array from the specified source array, beginning at the specified position, to the specified position of the destination array.

Docs.summary: Returns the current time in milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RunFinalization() cil managed

Docs.summary: Runs the finalization methods of any objects pending finalization.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RunFinalizersOnExit(bool value) cil managed

Docs.param: indicating enabling or disabling of finalization
Docs.summary: Enable or disable finalization on exit; doing so specifies that the finalizers of all objects that have finalizers that have not yet been automatically invoked are to be run before the Java runtime exits.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
